Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF JUNK
Reviews.Author: twelve gayger "twelvegayger"
Reviews.Content: This is the most frustrating piece of junk knock-off Go Pro camera out there.  It keeps showing a "card Error" whenever it gets near nature. Repeatedly works around the house, saves the video, plays back no problems.  Get it up on the mountain and BOOM!  Death to recording. "Card Error" is it's favorite game.  Nothing wrong with the card.  Works fine everywhere else.  Its a Gen10 16GB memory card. No problems with recording speed or other issues with older cards. Just the freaking camera.  So.  Do NOT be tempted by the low price.  It WILL NOT WORK. It's cheap, but what's the point of toting around a useless piece of plastic?  The only reason I haven't driven over the camera is that I want my money back.  The designer and Vivitar should be recalling these useless hunks of non-biodegradable garbage and using them for packing chips. JUNK, GARBAGE, FRUSTRATING, USELESS, WASTE OF TIME, ETC....

ProductInfo.Features:
5.0 Mega Pixels
2.0 Inch Full TOUCH Screen - Waterproof Case
Lithium Ion Battery
Uses Micro SD Mamory Card to 32GB not included USB 2 2.0
INCLUDES: Helmet Mount, Bike Mount and Stand Accessory
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar DVR785 High Definition Action Camera - Black
